message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.Distributed, cs.SY. 

The paper describes a distributed monitoring service architecture for global Grid systems, which involves distributed computing and networking. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also mentions network-performance monitoring algorithms and end-to-end network performance, which suggests the category cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The use of JINI/JAVA and WSDL/SOAP technologies indicates the category cs.SE (Software Engineering). The paper also mentions loosely coupled self-describing dynamic services, which suggests the category cs.Distributed (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). Finally, the paper mentions the ability to monitor the performance and state of site facilities in a Grid, which suggests the category cs.SY (Systems and Control).
